price: Akasema: Mgeuzieni kiti chake cha enzi hiki, tuone ataongoka, au atakuwa miongoni mwa wasio ongoka.
arabic: قَالَ نَكِّرُواْ لَهَا عَرۡشَهَا نَنظُرۡ أَتَهۡتَدِيٓ أَمۡ تَكُونُ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَهۡتَدُونَ
footnotes: Sulaiman akawaambia watu wake: Kigeuzeni geuzeni hichi kiti cha enzi kwa baadhi ya mabadiliko ya nje, tupate kuona atakijua kwa kukiendea au hato kijua na kwa hivyo hato kiendea.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla nakkirū lahā ʿarshahā nanẓur atahtadī am takūnu mina alladhīna lā yahtadūna
